meanings.definition: Objects or pieces of art created by carving wood.
meanings.sent1: The woodcarvings in the museum were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate woodcarvings on the antique chair.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the woodcarvings for real nuts.
meanings.sent4: His talent for creating woodcarvings was like a magic spell on the raw material.
meanings.sent5: The woodcarvings seemed to come alive with each delicate stroke of the artist's tools.

meanings.definition: The act or process of carving designs or figures into wood.
meanings.sent1: Watching the woodcarvings being made was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of woodcarvings from his grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The woodcarvings seemed to dance under the skilled hands of the artist.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to perfecting woodcarvings was as solid as the oak she carved.
meanings.sent5: The sound of woodcarvings being created echoed through the workshop.

meanings.definition: A collection or display of carved wooden items.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a stunning exhibit of woodcarvings from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the variety of woodcarvings on display.
meanings.sent3: The woodcarvings in the gallery whispered stories of ancient forests.
meanings.sent4: The room glowed with the warmth of the woodcarvings' history.
meanings.sent5: Each woodcarving in the collection held a unique charm that captivated all who saw them.
